events.message: I received the wrong product and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this purchase does not meet my expectations.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving the incorrect item.
Assigning the case to Refund Support Team to handle the customer's request for a refund.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I am here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached a clear photo of the wrong product I received.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund immediately and provide you with a prepaid label to return the incorrect item.
That sounds perfect, thank you for the quick response and easy solution!
The refund has been processed and the return label sent to your email. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and that everything has been resolved to your satisfaction.
We are closing this case now, but please don’t hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or concerns.
